Title: Relates to prohibiting supervised injection sites
Summary: Relates to prohibiting supervised injection sites; provides that it shall be unlawful for any person to own, operate, work in or volunteer at a supervised injection site; defines terms and establishes penalties.
LawCode: Amd §§3302 & 3390, add §3395, Pub Health L; amd §6530, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the education law, in relation to prohibiting supervised injection sites
